TKT-03C22B4C.description: The IV pump, a Baxter Sigma Spectrum Infusion Pump – Model 35700 with asset number 1245789, is displaying an error message: “Air-in-Line Detected – Check Line” and intermittently sounds a continuous alarm tone. The pump is not currently connected to a patient and was removed from service as soon as the issue was identified. Normal Saline (0.9% Sodium Chloride) was being infused at the time the issue occurred, and no additives were present in the solution. To our knowledge, the pump has not been dropped or subjected to any physical trauma recently; it was mounted securely on the IV pole during use.
